snippet: Angola’s central bank said the local division of Banco Espírito Santo would need to increase its capital to deal with bad loans.
abstract: Espirito Santo International, one of holding companies of Portugal's Espirito Santo banking family, files for creditor protection as business empire's problems spill over to Angola, where central banks says local unit of Banco Espirito Santo needs more capital to deal with bad loans.
lead_paragraph: Angola’s central bank said the local division of Banco Espírito Santo would need to increase its capital to deal with bad loans.
